Package com.valstro.hometask.client

Class SocketIoClient

java.lang.Object
com.valstro.hometask.client.AbstractClient
com.valstro.hometask.client.SocketIoClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client
public class SocketIoClient extends AbstractClient
Socket.io implementation of the Client interface.
Test server url:
http://localhost:3000/socket.io/?EIO=4&transport=polling returns:
0{"sid":"e8IM03XHmctoWx7MAAAA","upgrades":["websocket"],"pingInterval":25000,"pingTimeout":20000}

    • subscribeToEvent

      public void subscribeToEvent(String name, Client.EventWrapper listener)
      Description copied from interface: Client
      Subscribes to an event stream identified by the event name. Each event will trigger a callback function for processing the payload.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the event stream to subscribe to
      listener - Callback function used to process the event
